name: Take Back TSA
description:
*2ND PLACE IN VIDEO GAME DESIGN AT THE 2019 NATIONAL TSA CONFERENCE*

Take Back TSA is a third-person action-adventure RPG where you must save the TSA Executive Board after they have been taken hostage by evil robots. Interact with other students, solve puzzles, fight robots, and discover the robots' motives as you explore the 2019 NJ TSA State Conference.

Controls:

W is used to move forward.

A is used to move to the left.

S is used to move backward.

D is used to move to the right.

To crouch, press Ctrl. To dash, hold shift while moving with WASD. To jump, press the spacebar.

To interact with people or objects, press E.

Look around with the mouse, left-click to fire your blaster, and right-click to zoom in.

Game was made by Ruchir B., Victor F., Alissa A., Harrison A., Ivan S., and William V.
